remarks: Commutative/associative law for Abelian groups.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
ablcom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablcom.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
cmn32 $p |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) = ( ( X .+ Z ) .+ Y ) ) $.
